thread.title: Reese Witherspoon, daughter Ava Phillippe are twins at 'Big Little Lies' premiere
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon, daughter Ava Phillippe are twins at 'Big Little Lies' premiere

author: USA TODAY
title: Reese Witherspoon, daughter Ava Phillippe are twins at 'Big Little Lies' premiere
text:
Reese Witherspoon, daughter Ava Phillippe are twins at 'Big Little Lies' premiere Erin Jensen, USA TODAY 11:04   
Allegedly not an optical illusion. (Photo: Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) 
Seriously, is there a mirror between these two? Or, did a time machine crash causing irreparable damage, leaving Reese Witherspoon to raise her past self under the guise of her "daughter" Ava Phillippe? Probably not, but it's hard to discount those theories after viewing photos of the two at Tuesday's premiere of the HBO miniseries Big Little Lies at the TCL Chinese Theatre in Hollywood. 
Twinning! (Photo: Steve Granitz, WireImage) 
Both wore their hair pulled back with tendrils framing their nearly identical faces and long sleeve dresses, cinched at the waist that hit just above the knee. Ava, 17, wore a metallic frock by HANEY with gold, pointed pumps. Her mother, 40, wore a dress with a very similar silhouette, except for a thigh-high slit, by Elie Saab and accessorized with Tiffany & Co. jewelry. 
The genes are strong in this one. (Photo: Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP) 
The mother-daughter duo weren't the only ones to get our attention at the event. Kathreen Khavari used her photo op to respond to President Trump's immigration ban by donning a dress that doubled as a political statement. 
One way to get a message across. (Photo: JIMMY MORRISON, EPA) 
In a blog for The Huffington Post published in 2014, the actress explained why she wrote and starred in Brain of Terror , a short film about a woman who dreams she's a terrorist after binge-watching Showtime's Homeland starring Claire Danes. 
"And so while I gave myself a chance to play," Khavari wrote, "I also intended to show the world that identity is shaped by so much more than ethnic origin or the country in which one’s parents were born. Identity is complex, fluid, and can be ever-changing. Pigeon-holing a person or a group of people is not only damaging to humanity, but it’s beyond boring. Hopefully we’ll figure that out eventually." Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. The Kardashians are one famous example of mother-daughter lookalikes. In honor of Mother's Day, revisit other celebrity moms whose Hollywood genes run in the family. Frazer Harrison, Getty Images for Cosmopolitan Fullscreen LOS ANGELES, CA - JANUARY 30: Actresses Susan Sarandon (L) and Eva Amurri attend the 22nd Annual Screen Actors Guild Awards at The Shrine Auditorium on January 30, 2016 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty Images) ORG XMIT: 598533617 ORIG FILE ID: 507671472 Alberto E. Rodriguez, Getty Images Zoe Kravitz and mom Lisa Bonet in 2015. Anthony Harvey, Getty Images Lourdes Leon and Madonna in 2011. Pascal Le Segretain, Getty Images Rumer Willis and mom Demi Moore in 2009 — and they look even more similar now.
